title: Theatre Alliance: ligatures and characters in Mantinia
content:
Since I know that the Uppercase section isn't the most watched area, I'm posting this [link](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526121714/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/read.php?file=/4105/33192.html) to a critique I started there. Any UC input is greatly appreciated.   
   
Sorry about the exclusivity of the thread. The logotype is being kept somewhat under wraps, but I got approval to seek limited Typophile advice at this stage in the process. I'll post it here for general critique as soon as it's further on in the approval process.
author: crugen

comments.content:
Sure, tease us who don't have access.   
   
...
